address.docs:
**, int**: The [I²C](https://esphome.io/components/i2c.html#i2c) address of the sensor.

*See also: [CCS811 eCO_2 and Volatile Organic Compound Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ccs811.html#configuration-variables)*

baseline.docs:
**, int**: The baseline value for the unit, for calibration purposes. See [Calibrating Baseline](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ccs811.html#ccs811-calibrating) for more info.

*See also: [CCS811 eCO_2 and Volatile Organic Compound Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ccs811.html#configuration-variables)*

eco2.docs:
The eCO_2 data from the sensor in parts per million (ppm).
  * All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).
  
  

*See also: [CCS811 eCO_2 and Volatile Organic Compound Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ccs811.html#configuration-variables)*

humidity.docs:
**, [ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: Give an external humidity sensor ID here. This can improve the sensor’s internal calculations.

*See also: [CCS811 eCO_2 and Volatile Organic Compound Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ccs811.html#configuration-variables)*

temperature.docs:
**, [ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: Give an external temperature sensor ID here. This can improve the sensor’s internal calculations.

*See also: [CCS811 eCO_2 and Volatile Organic Compound Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ccs811.html#configuration-variables)*

tvoc.docs:
The information for the total volatile organic compound sensor in parts per billion (ppb).
  * All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).
  
  

*See also: [CCS811 eCO_2 and Volatile Organic Compound Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ccs811.html#configuration-variables)*

update_interval.docs:
**, [Time](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-time)**: The interval to check the sensor. Defaults to `60s`.

*See also: [CCS811 eCO_2 and Volatile Organic Compound Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ccs811.html#configuration-variables)*

version.docs:
This sensor reports the firmware (‘application’) version in text, with the internal hex representation of the version number behind it, so version 1.0.0 will be reported as ‘1.0.0 (0x1000)’.
  * All options from [Text Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/text_sensor/index.html#config-text-sensor).
  
  

*See also: [CCS811 eCO_2 and Volatile Organic Compound Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ccs811.html#configuration-variables)*
